subject: Self Care
title: The Future of Sleep Science
description: Learn The Future of Sleep Science in one minute.

hook.text: Scientists are developing devices that boost deep sleep with gentle electrical brain stimulation.

buildup.text: Targeted memory reactivation plays sounds during sleep to strengthen specific memories selectively.

discovery.text: Sleep tracking wearables are now accurate enough to detect sleep stages in real time at home.

twist.text: Obsessing over sleep data can cause 'orthosomnia' â€” anxiety about imperfect sleep that worsens it.

climax.text: The science is advancing fast. But the fundamentals still matter most: darkness, coolness, consistency.

punchline.text: Sleep tech helps, but good habits remain king.

quiz.question: What is orthosomnia?
options: Anxiety about imperfect sleep data that worsens sleep
